1.content: As a certain professor would say, are you male or female?
1.title: Getting started

11.content:
You slowly opened your eyes and looked around you. It all started back at home where you tried to investigate that mysterious crystal you found and there you are; in this strange world blue vortex that was pushing you foreword. You don't know what's going on besides the fact you are no longer in your house or even your world for that matter.

This took about five minutes until you finally came to a large empty space filled with giant colorful spheres floating around. Each of them contains many views of several locations of some sort. You float around for a bit, trying to find some way to get back home until you unknowingly come across one of the spheres and you immediately began to get sucked in. You swam as fast and hard as you can, but you don't have the strength to do so and got suck into the giant ball.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

World 1

This world has your avenge modern-day setting. There's no monsters or any kind fantasy materials just a normal-looking world very similar to yours just very huge and gigantic. Many locations includes: towns, cities, suburbs, and many more.

World 2

This world is yet another avenge modern-looking sociality only expect it's full of giant anthropomorphic animals. There's not much to say about the themes other than being similar to World 1.

World 3

This one takes place in a dark and eerie city full of giant humanoid monsters. These includes: Nagas, Werewolves, Anthropomorphic Dragons, Harpies, and so on. Besides the city, there are other locates and each are pretty much similar to your own world.

World 4

Unlike the other three which all take place in modern sociality, this one takes place in an old-fashioned town that is inhabited by giant Halloween characters (think Halloweentown). Like the third world, it's also full of monster, but it's also filled with any people related to the stereotypical Halloween setting such as witches. The town is basically old with a classic European feel to it.

World 5

????????????????
11.title: Male

choices: In the middle of a large buliding. (Inside a family home.)
In a biazare forest with strange green trees. (In the middle of a park.)
Next to colossal buliding. (Outside a school buliding.)
111.content:
After your struggle with the spherical vortex, you soon blacked out.

After what appeared to be minutes, you slowly gain consciousness and wondered what on earth just happened to you. You were trying to escape from that highly dangerous vortex and you just ended up right here. You try to look around a bit, but your vision weren't cleared enough after your unconsciousness state. You shook your head a few times until you managed to get your bearings and get a much clearer look at where you are.
111.title: Not so ordinary world...

choices: Get the hell out of this horrible nightmare
1111.content:
"I...must be still dreaming." you said from the movement you laid eyes upon this utterly new world around you. This place looked just like an ordinary living room in a ordinary family home, but....there's something wrong here. There really isn't anything weird about this place only except:

EVERYTHING'S FREAKIN HUGE!!!!!!

"Calm down...calm yourself down! It's all a dream." you said as you're in a urge of freaking out. Due to your new speak-like size, you couldn't see much of this room other than a giant television in front of you and a gigantic couch behind you. The carpeted floor look like a landscape of texture that spread for miles and a ceiling fan hangs high above you like a UFO in the sky. This was a living nightmare, but you couldn't help the fact that everything seemed so real to you. "Seeing all this makes me feel like a tiny flea in this house." you said "I wonder if someone's home right now?" You stood on the same spot and listened carefully for any sounds. However as five minutes have passed, you couldn't hear a thing. "I guess they're either asleep or they're not home right now." you said, glad that you are safe for now.

You look to your left to see a path that what appeared to lead to the entryway. You think that you could just go out and escape right away, but you know that could be extremely dangerous since you have no idea what further danger waits ahead of you. You look behind and saw the giant couch, maybe you could hide there and seek shelter there for a while.

What's your choice?
1111.title: House of the giants

choices: A pair of white sneakers (Liza sitting down on the couch, reading a magazine)
A pair of green flip-flops and red sneakers (Amy and Trevor watching TV)
A giant hand (Steven napping on the couch)
11111.content:
You don't think you could survive the outside world just yet; you're not even ready to do such thing at the movement. "Well I guess there's no escaping right now." you said as you immediately turn to face the couch and run towards it. You also know that this would take two or three hours to get there by now. "I just hope nothing happens at this movement." you said as you race your way to your destination.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------< br />
It was just an average day for the entire Robinwill family as they just gotten out of the supermarket and now ready to go back home. "Whew, carrying around these grocery was sure exhauting." said Liza Robinwill as she place them in the back of the car. "Oh come on hon, is not that bad." replied her husband, Steve Robinwill. "Oh yeah, try doing that yourself!" said a slightly annoyed Liza. Two of their children, Amy and Trevor Robinwill finished placing their own and both sat down in the car. "Next time Trevor, ask me or mom and dad if you want to go get those free samples." said Amy to her younger brother. "We almost lost you there." "Oh come on Amy, I'm a big boy right now. I could go on my own pace if I wanted to." said Trevor "You still need permission, Everyone does it." The two began to argue as usual while their parents began to drive off straight back home. "Kids these day." muttered Steven.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Finally it took for about a good three and the half hour for you to finally reach the couch. "*Pant*...*Pant*...I finally made it. *Pant* Now it's a good time for me to rest now." you said. You slowly fall down and decided to take a rest. As you lay down there, you suddenly heard a faint sound of what sounded like a car getting parked, followed by a car alarm. "Oh crap, the owners are probably home now." you said as you heard the sounds of thundering footsteps. You listened real carefully before a loud sound of a door being opened and comes out a series of giant shadows coming from the entryway as you can still make it out despite being far away from you. The first to come to view was a giant man who looked to be in his mid-20s with short brown hair and wears a long-sleeved blue shirt, brown pants, and black loofers. Next is a giant woman almost the man's age with long black hair and wears a orange striped midriff-baring shirt, tight dark blue jeans with a black belt, and white NIKE sneakers. The third one is a giant girl who looked to be 13-15 that has brown hair that was tied in a ponytail and wears a bright pink T-shirt with a large red heart on it, a pair of brown shorts, and green flip-flops. The fourth and final one is a giant boy that is about 11 years old with black hair and wears a red jacket, blue jeans, and red sneakers. These giants are the owners of this house and they're HUGE!!! "Man I couldn't be smaller than their smallest toe." you said, trying to be confident on yourself. You noticed that they're carry grocery bags and thought that they were going to the kitchen and put them away. You were still kinda tried from all that walking so you think it's safe you to rest here since nobody won't be able to find you at the movement. You lay down on the soft carpeting and slowly fell asleep.

After all that rest, you quickly woke up and look around. "Crap, I'm still here! It's this real life after all?" you said and suddenly you saw something outside your hiding place. You carefully walk towards it to take a closer look. As you got there, you finally make out what it was.
11111.title: The big arrival

1113.content:
You found yourself in a middle of a concrete landscape that stretches for miles. You weren't sure about your location completely until you looked behind to see something that made your eyes wide as a lemur. Standing behind you was a gigantic building which might as well be a humongous castle due to great size. Although you were a bit nervous about this situation, you decided to check to the place out and see if you could find anyone to help you out. You make a quick dash to the door....or at least trying to but unfortunately, the door was oddly far away to you. "That's funny, why is the building slowly getting bigger when I try to get closer?" you asked as you could see the doors were getting taller and taller, is it some sort of strange illusion?

As you got closer, you finally realized the truth: this building REALLY is gigantic! You finally made it to the doors to see it tower over you like an insect; you soon wished that it was an illusion. "Holy crap, this can't be real!" you said "that crystal must of sent me here in this giant world!" You wanted to slip beneath the doors to see the inferior of this building but, the doors have no gaps to slip in so you just going to have to wait until some giant open them without their notice on you.

Sitting down, you began asking questions to yourself: What was that crystal that sent you here? How are you going to back home? What's going to happen to you? Suddenly, you hear a loud sound coming from the far distance; it almost sounded like a...bus horn? You looked straight ahead and could make out a giant yellow object that almost look like a bus of some sort. "I don't even get what's going on..." you said.

RING!!!!!!!!!

A loud noise that was enough to startled you bursts out from behind you. "WHAT THE HELL?!" you shout from the sudden sound. It seemed to be a bell of some sort, almost like a school bell...what a minute. It was all making sense now, this was a giant school building and those object were actually school buses. By the looks of it, school must be starting right now and the students are all ready to began their day.

The question is what kind of school this is exactly? You look to see the giant students now leaving the buses and going to began their day. By the looks of their ages, this might be...
1113.title: Get ready to be schooled

11131.content:
It was an elementary school, there's no doubt about it as you see nothing but giant children coming to your way. Looking at the ongoing stampede and feeling the ground slowly began to shake like a deadly earthquake, it's pretty damn oblivious that you should well....MOVE THE HELL OUT OF THE WAY AS SOON AS POSSIBLE!!!!!

You make a leaping jump to the left just as their feet were approaching you fast and make their way to the school doors. You make your way to a nearby bench to hide from the kids since you have no idea what will happen if they ever see you; you think it's a good idea to be spotted by a child, especially a giant one.

You made it and hide underneath the bench. You watch as the children were now all over the school grounds. Many of them were walking around, talking to each other and among other things. You could try to go inside the school to find an adult to help you out, but you fear of being caught by the students. However, you can't wait around here, can't you? So with no other choice, you go and make a dash to the door....or at least try to because you soon find someone coming here to sit on this bench.

Who were the ones trying to sit?
11131.title: Elementary My Dear

111311.content:
You see three young girls walking towards the bench that you are hiding under at the moment. As these girls make their way to the bench, you saw that they were about 10 to 11 years old. Unfortunately, you were too late to see what they completely look like since they made it to the bench and sat down on it just as you were about to observe them. In front of you, all you could see are six footwears slightly dangling from above. In the center is a pair of gray boots, in the left is a pair of red Converse shoes that were below a blue jean, and at the right is a pair of lavender sneakers with red little hearts on each side that covered the pair of pink socks. You watch as their shoes shift, tap, and even stretch a bit while hearing their conversation from above; it just a simple girls talk so you weren't interested at hearing it. You decided to take a look on the three young girls and make your way out of the bench to the right. You walk out of it and go to were the girls are; in the middle of their path. Thankfully, they are too focused on themselves to notice you so it gives you some time to see what they look like.

For a bunch of young girls, they all look very attractive for their ages. Their beauty were enough to make you want just stare at them for a long time. In fact, they look more like young beauty queens than children; they are tweens after all, so not that very unusual to see pretty preteens like these.

The one in the middle has black hair tied in a ponytail and green eyes. She wears a white T-shirt with a large pink heart on it, a purple skirt, a blue necklace with a jade gem around her neck, and a pair of gray knee-high boots.

The one on the left has long blond hair tied in a black headband and hazel eyes which you see some bit of pink eyeliner across it. She wears a long-sleeved light blue shirt with red stripes, a short black pencil skirt, and a pair of pink socks and lavender sneakers with little red hearts on each side.

The one on the right has burnette curls, blue eyes, and has slight tanned skin. She wears a pink vest over a short sky blue shirt that reveals her midriff, a pair of blue jeans that is tied by a magenta belt with a golden buckle, and a pair of red Coverse shoes.

You watched as they're still talking to each other. Even thought you don't want to go with children, these three look at least old enough to understand your problem so maybe you could try to contact them. However, you still don't even know if they are even that nice to began with.

Despite this; however, you can't really survive in this world on foot so you're gonna have to seek safety on one of these pretty girls for now, even if it means risking your life by them.

Where will go for?
111311.title: Pretty Giantesses

choices: A sneaker belonging to a teen boy
A sandal belonging to a teen girl
A boot belonging to a preteen girl
11132.content:
The students you're looking at were either tweens or young teenagers meaning this might be a middle school; a GIANT middle school. You see most of them running to the school which that you need to get out of their way as quick as you can. You leap to your right and watch as the students make their way inside.

Since the giants were at least old enough to understand your current position, it would be alright to get their attention. As you run towards the path of the giants, you thought about trying to leap and grab onto their foot as they walk pass; it'll make it easier to get in the school and try to get the attention of whoever you were riding on while inside.

You ran and leap forward to one of the shoes of the giant teens. You close your eyes as you hope that you succeed. Thankfully, you managed to land and grab onto a passing shoe which you hold on tight as the giant makes their way to the school.

Whose shoe did you land on?
11132.title: Stuck In The Middle

11133.content:
Coming out of that bus were teenagers but unlike the ones from your world, these were very giant teenagers that were big enough to stomp you like a bug. Thankfully, you don't have to run away and get out of the way because they are simply just walking towards the school building which you learn that it was indeed a high school, but that still won't mean you will just stand there and let them squish you.

You watch as they either walk pass you or just stay on the school grounds as you think about trying to get some help from them. Even though they were all old enough to understand your perils, that doesn't mean all of them will be nice enough to take care of you; you have to at least find someone who looks like a friendly face.

You look at the left to see a teen boy and girl; both are about 18 years old. They were talking to each other and you can see them holding hands meaning they were lovers. Since they were seniors, you can see that may help you out since they were also very nice too.

You look at the right to see a 16 year old girl that looks kinda nerdy. A very intelligent person may know how to help you out so you could just get some alot answers from her to figure out what's going on here.

Finally, you something next to the school bus that was even better. It was an adult woman who appears to be one of the teachers around here. You definitely need an adult for help so they could take care you as much as possible.

Where do you go?
11133.title: High Society

choices: ...crunched up soda can (On the middle of a sidewalk on a city)
...strange tree surronded by other similar trees (On a sleeping anthro's body)
112.content:
You screamed as you get sucked into the sphere and soon your world have blacken out.

It took a good half-hour for you to wake up. You quickly remembered attempting to escape from that spherical vortex. You got up from the ground and try to look around. However, your mouth soon dropped right before you try to look around. In front of you was a giant object that was extremely huge compared to you and it looked big enough for you to take about three or four hours to climb on top of it. You take a closer look to see that it was a giant...
112.title: The furry universe

1122.content:
...pebble!

The object that you are looking at is a huge pebble!

"What the hell?!" you shouted while your mouth was still open; dumbfounded at the sight in front of you. A pebble shouldn't be this big, what's going on here? You look down at the ground after you suddenly felt yourself sinking beneath it while you were laying down. Grains of sand, what? You finally took the chance to look around you and see where you are.

The landscape was completely covered in sand, almost like you are in a desert. Speaking of a desert, the temperature around here is hot enough to make you sweat. "I sure wish I brought a bottle of water before I end up in...whatever I'm currently in." you said as you can feel the sun rays flashing from the sun itself. Okay so back at home, you found some sort of crystal you don't even remember owning and next, you ended up in some sort of world full of floating, colorful spheres and finally, you found yourself in a middle of a desert with giant pebble next to you.

Suddenly, you could hear a sound coming from somewhere. It didn't sound too far but it was noticeable. It seen to be coming from the ________ and it seemed to sound alot like...
1122.title: Sunny Desert

11223.content:
You tried to hear where those noise where coming from so you stand still for a second to know what is making a slight earthquake to the ground. You waited a moment until it gets louder and louder and that it's seen to be coming from behind you. You turned the vast desert to see something huge is coming this way and that it is creating a huge sandstorm.

It seems not noticing your tiny little presence as you are still hidden by the pebble that was bigger than you and that they can crush you any moment. You tried to see what the figure is coming but it looks like it is sort kind of animal but with two paws and to arms like a humanoid. "This can't be real" You thought as the figure gets closer to your position and that you tried to make out what kind an animal this that is about to crush you...
11223.title: ...footsteps?! (back)

choices: Something happens before you could even choose
112233.content:
You are amazed to what you are looking at:

A giga-sized anthropomorphic lioness girl coming towards your way!

"Holy crap, this DEFINITELY can't be real!" you thought as the giant anthro was slowly approaching.

She looks to be somewhere in her 20s and has cream-colored fur, long blonde hair that was tied in a ponytail, and the only clothing she is wearing was a green and red bikini. Seeing that makes think a bit until you saw that she is carry a what looks to be a blue beach towel under her right arm. You quickly look away behind you and soon you found yourself looking at a large ocean that wasn't very far away from both you and the lioness. "This is not a desert..." you said in realization "I'm standing in the middle of a giant beach!"

The ground shakes even harder as the giantess is now getting closer. Luckily for you, she soon stops right next to you. Did she noticed you? You can't really tell because you can't no longer see her face by this point, only her lower torso and legs (as well as her black handbag that was danging above from her left). Due to not even paying attention to you, it doesn't seem to be true as she's simply just standing there; almost if she's waiting for something.

You just stood there and stared at the giant creature. Even though she is a lioness, you can't help but found her quite beautiful and attractive as she has a very shapely figure. You think that this furry woman takes very good care of her body. Since she's still unaware of your presence, you wonder if you could...

Your thoughts got interrupted when you hear a familiar sound nearby; it was yet another series of footsteps. You soon see what you expected; another giant was coming.

This time however it appears to be masculine in appearance and you realized that the giant in question was a giant male lion coming right towards you and the lioness.

He looks to be either the same age or slightly older than the other one. He has golden-colored fur and short brown hair that connected to his mane of the same color (which gives the impression of a bread) and is wearing a pair of red swim trunks with blue stripes on each side. Just like her, he appears to be very good-looking and handsome as he has a very toned body.

You watch as the lion walked up to the lioness and they both hugged each other; followed by the sounds of smooching. You discovered that these lions are in fact lovers as you hear giggling coming from the lioness from how happy she is to see her boyfriend. You can also hear some conversation between them:

"Sorry I took so long, Nadia." said the lion.

"Aw that's okay, Sam." said the lioness who's name was Nadia. "What happened to you on the way?"

"You know, annoying traffic jam." said Sam "But that's not important right now. What matters is that we're together again, love."

"Oh you!" giggled Nadia "I told my friends that I wanted to be alone with you so don't worry about them."

"That's good to hear." said sam.

"What to rest under the sun?" asked Nadia.

"You bet, just got my blanket here." answered Sam as he set down his beach blanket along with Nadia's.

After the conversation (which was more like hearing titans talk rather than people), they both lie down on their towel on their backs; creating a series of quakes. After that, they began to take a nap.

"Wow, they look more like mountains at this size." you said as you were looking at the sleeping giants. you began to think of what to do now.

You could approach one of their bodies and maybe try to get their attention. You don't know why, but you began to have some other thoughts while they're napping away. You were still fascinated on what you witnessed in front of your eyes. Could you just try to walk around on them and do some bit of research or something?

Who will you approach?
112233.title: Between The Lions

choices: You starts climbing on his feet
You start climbing on his swimming truck
You start climbing by his head
1122332.content:
As you examine both of the bodies, you decided that you wanted to go with Sam and possibly do some research or exploring on him. You did wanted to go with Nadia but then again what will happen to you if the male lion wakes up and somehow finds your tiny little body seeing that you are male and exploring his girlfriend that is next to you? He may take it the wrong way and just crushed like that with his fingers or just stomp you. So you didn't wanted that and to prevent you decided to go on exploring the giant lion himself. This way he won't get jealous or anything if he finds your tiny body or anything. You were sure that his girlfriend would understand your situation about it.

Enough thinking about the outcomes,you proceed forward to the gigantic male lion that is sleeping on his back with the towel on it. You have to admitted it that he looks very strong for a lion and that you can see his muscles rising up and down as he breathing so calmly. You don't know why but you think it is a best choice to explore him while he is sleeping and before he wakes up so you can see his full body fully. You have approached by his feet and seeing how big it is, it looks like huge skyscraper looming over your, but bigger than that for some reason. Of course you are the size of a pebble and that everything around you is huge.You are not sure where to start climbing as you see his body is kinda moving around in his sleep and that you don't want to get crushed by him or his girlfriend.

You take some thought to think where you start climbing or explore....
1122332.title: Sam

choices: A harpy mother with her young daughter
113.content:
You don't know how long you were knockout from your intense battle with that planetary sphere, but you don't seemed to care much about it. After gaining your strength again, you got from the cold hard ground and take a quick look at your surroundings: you still don't know where you are, but your surroundings was quite dark. There were two towering buildings on each side and on your left was a huge green dumpster that was the size a large castle to you. "This place is giving me the creeps..." you said nervously as you finished looking around and soon discovered that you were on the middle of a giant city alley of some sort. "Why the hell everything's huge?" you yelled and decided to run and try to find the exit to this scary place. You look around until you see a path that leads to the city streets. With no hesitating movement, you immediately rushed towards it.

It took two hours to get there due to your tiny state, but at least you managed to get there. You looked across it to at first see nothing until you saw something that immediately shocked you. At your left, they're was a gigantic shadow coming into your view. You quickly hide into a giant, discarded, empty can and take a small peek on who it is. What you saw shocked you even more when you saw the giant being(s) standing right next you.
113.title: The dark city of monsters

1131.content:
"Hmm..it seemed quiet around here." said Heather as she walked slowly across the streets and looked around just to make sure nobody is watching. The dragoness have planned to see her goons to discuss their next motivate for their latest crime. So far, there's no one at the streets so it's real perfect for Heather to walk around at the darkest night. "Alright here we go!" she said as she went into the dark alley.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------

You gasped as you a saw a huge, scaley, reptilian foot slammed right next to the opening of your hiding spot. It was absolutely huge which was enough to terrified you. Carefully, you approached the foot slowly and looked up to see that it was conneted to a pair of long, black jeans that went up for miles. So far, you can only make out a long tail that comes from behind and a matching jacket; you couldn't see his or her face yet. However, you can tell that this definitely not a human being. You wonder if you could go with this giant creature and see what he or she is up to. However, since you have no idea who this creature is, you think that it would be best to stay here and wait until the giant leaves.
1131.title: The dragoness crime lord

choices: A war against a rivaling gang
11311.content:
It said that curiously killed the cat but you're not a cat and you are not dead. You watched as the giant slowly (to you) walked to the alley; the same place where you woken up from. Their movement was like watching a giant monster roaming across the land in front of your eyes and the green reptilian-like feet further captures the experience. You are not sure what they're up to so you decided that, despite the enormous risk of getting yourself hurt, go and investigate the creature's motive.

As you exit the can, you saw that the giant was already ahead of you. However, you can finally make out the monster's apprenace due to the distance.

The first thing you noticed that the giant in question is actually a female after looking at the shape of her figure. The second thing you noticed was the huge wings she has on her back; figuring out that this creature that you're looking at is a gigantic, anthropomorphic dragon. The third and last thing you noticed was the symbol on the back of her jacket (between her wings). The symbol was red and triangle-shaped with the letter "H" on it. What does that mean? Unfortunately, you couldn't see her face since you are only looking at her back; all you could see was her long, black hair that covered her neck.

As you ran up to her, you knew you couldn't keep up with her so you make running leap to catch and climbed on top of her foot as it rises up. You hold on tightly (hopefully it doesn't bother the giantess to much) as she took one step which was almost like riding a horse that makes long leaps across the fields. "This is one ride that I won't be waiting in line for." you said and looked ahead to see nothing but darkness as the dragoness further strolled into the alley. Where is she going?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------

Heather walked all the way to the dark alley to meet up with her gang. She have told everyone to meet up at this exact location at the middle of the night since the chances of getting caught by law enforcements and witnesses at this place and time are slim to none.

Heather finally reaches in front of the steel door and knocked it. "Guys it's me, open it up!" she called. The door opened and the dragoness stepped inside.

Once in their hideout, she was greeted by her four goons: Earl, Boris, Xavier, and Trish. "Glad you can make it boss." said Boris "Yeah yeah, I know now." she said as she walked pass them.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------

You found yourself looking in front of a hideout of some sort as your unaware ride walked inside. The room was looked small and slighty messy; there were some paper and trash lying on the floor. Other than that, there's not much stuff other than a table, some chairs, and a desk. In front of you were four more giant monsters coming to greet the dragon woman.

The first guy appeared to be slightly shorter than the others (well at least to them) and has a long, black beard. He wears a red tuxedo with a matching tie, pants and even pair of shoes. His noticeable feature is his large red top hat, his attire seemed to red as blood, and he has a devious look too. This monster is based on the red cap.

The second guy is a large, musclar monster with two large horns, black fur, and a head that resembled a bull. He wears a dark green, sleeveless shirt, dog tags around his neck, and pair of brown cargo shorts. He appears to be based on the minotaur.

The third guy is very tall individual that closely resembles a eagle but you noticed that he's got a lion's tail behind him. He wears a green hoodie and blue jeans. He's actually a griffin.

The last and fourth isn't a guy but a girl. She's shown to have cold look with white hair and wears a dark blue tank top. She doesn't seem to have any legs as they been replaced by a large spider-half that was black in color. This woman's a Drider.

"This world...is full of giant monsters." you said, finally realizing where you are. You still don't even know what these guys are and what they are doing here in the middle of the night. You felt the giantess moving again and said:

"Alright guys, here's what we need to do."
11311.title: Follow the leader

1132.content:
Wendy and her young daughter, Sophie were walking across the sidewalk, near night time. They just left from a friend's house who was hosting a party and now they were on their way home. Of course, they could just fly their way there, but that would be a waste of stamina and must wait until they reach a centain point of length to do so.

"So Sophie, do you have any plans for the upcoming school exam tomorrow?" wendy asked her daughter.


"I'm not sure mom." answered Sophie "I can't help but feel nervous about it and I don't know what to do." While Sophie usually doesn't care less with some subjects as there are times she does get good grades sometimes. However, what really set her up about exams is how she felt having her own intelligence being tested by the teachers with a bunch of very difficult questions and the pressure of being surrounded by those who were alot smarter than her; Sophie does not like that feeling of being so overwhelmed

"Now sweetie, you know that you can't just coward around like that. You need to have full confidence and try your best." said Wendy.

"Thanks mom..." said Sophie as she gave her mother a slight smile. She knows the fact that her mother wants to gave her some encouragement which was nice of her, but that doesn't seem to be enough to erase her fears.

Wendy already see through her daughter's fake smile and can't help but wonder if there's anything she could help. "What I'm saying is that you need to fight against your own fear and put up tons of effort into what your doing; don't let anyone around you get the best you." she said.

After hearing her words, Sophie did gain some confidence. "Thanks mom, I think I'm starting to feel better now." she said.

"That's my little girl, now get out there and show them what you're made off." said Wendy. She felt so glad to get her child's spirits up.

The two harpies stop next to an alley and both began to take off their shoes; this was so that they won't fall off while they fly. Wendy puts her sandals into her purse while Sophie puts her mary-janes in her dress pocket.

------------------------------------------------------------------

You take a small peak from inside your hiding spot to see two pairs of giant shoes coming straight to your spot. By the looks of these shoes, it appears that the giants might both be females. The one on the left is wearing black mary-janes while the other is wearing white sandals. You hide back into your shelter and curl yourself, believing that they'll probably going to step on the can and crush you from inside.

Suddenly, it all went quiet and you thought that they must of stopped somehow. You take a look once again and see that they were standing next to you; towering over you like the giants they are.

The giant on left appears to look alot smaller than the other one and is wearing a red dress. You can tell that she appeared to be quite young, almost like a preteen. The giant on the right is much bigger than the other one and is wearing blue shorts and a grey tank top. This one was an adult and is presumably the other one's mother. Unfortunately, you can't see their heads.

One unusual thing about both of them is that they don't appear to like human beings at all. Both of their legs seems to closely resembled those of birds and their arms look alot like bird wings. "What is this?" you asked "I'm I in a world of giant bird people?" As if trying to prove you further, they both took both of their footwear for some reason, revealing their talon-like feet.

You look at their feet and thought about trying to hitch a ride on one of them in order to either try to get their attention or go to whatever they are going.

Or maybe you could just leave and find help somewhere else.
1132.title: Feathers Of The Harpies

choices: Hitch a ride on the green tail (Henry)
Hitch a ride on the sky-blue tail (Beth)
Don't ride on them, just wait until they leave
1133.content:
It was just a quiet night for the two young naga lovers, Henry and Beth as they're taking a nice stroll (or um...slither) across the dark streets. "This sure is a fun night, eh love?" said Beth as she puts her arm around Henry's shoulder. "Yep, I sure can't believe how fun it was back at the concert." said Henry "Those musicians sure know how to play some badass tunes!" Henry lifts flexed his muscles and said "badass...like me!" Beth giggled and hugged him "Oh Henry, you sure do know how to impress a woman like myself." The nagas continued to wander the streets, unknowingly have pass by a tiny being inside a can between their tails.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------

Upon hearing a few voices from high above, your curiosity immediately got the best of you and go outside to investigate. Your mouth dropped out of surprise upon seeing two large, scaly, tails slithering by your hiding spot; they look a lot like snake tails. "What are giant snakes doing in the middle of nowhere?" you asked yourself, but you finally saw the answer once you looked high above the "snakes" and saw two gigantic bodies on top of them. These weren't ordinary snakes, NO they're actually nagas! You were left speechless on the sight in front of you, they look so huge and unusual at the same time. You don't really see much of their appearances due to being too tiny compared to them. You tell by their shape that the green one on the left is a male naga and the sky-blue one on the right is a female naga. You could see them both hugging each other, indicating that they are likely on a date. With nowhere else to go, you decided to unknowingly hitch a ride on one of them, unknowingly because you have no idea if they're friendly or not. However, you probably might have a second thought about this.
1133.title: A slitherly encounter

choices: An odd teacher with equally odd schoolchildren (A witch with various monsters)
114.content:
After a painful trip through the sphere, you laid there in an unknown location, completely unconscious. You have this terrifying dream which involves you getting chased by a giant foot that was the size of a planet slowly descending right towards you. You tried to outrun it, but it was almost impossible to do so and just it was about to be too late for you, you finally woken up with a scream. Breathing hard, you realized it was all just a dream. "My god that was scary!" you said at loud.

You slowly opened your eyes, expecting that you are in your room, on your bed. However instead of that, you appeared to be on top of a large branch of an old tree. "Huh? What the hell?" you asked yourself "This isn't my room, where am I?" You stood up and took care not to fall off the branch. This tree seemed to be about hundreds or even thousands of feet from the ground, but you don't mind since lots of trees can be pretty tall and huge. You slowly walked towards to the peak of the branch, trying to find out where you truly are.

After a long walk, you reached to the "cliff" and look around. "Wow, everything seemed a little...eerie!" you said to yourself as you looked at sight in your view. You appeared to be on a large open field that was filled with dark green grass and unusually creepy plants. Further ahead was another forest of old trees (although you do see some lively tree that were just as eerie as the rest of the plants.). You look up high at the sky to see a very darken sky full of ghastly, swirly, clouds. There was a huge, bright, full moon that was illuminating from behind the clouds. You couldn't help it, but found the moon to be quite beautiful from here.

"Man this place is kinda creepy, but strangely fascinating at the same time." you said and saw something that caught your eye. Far away at your right was a large old-looking town with buildings that were bright from the moonlight. "I wonder I could go there and try to figure out where am I." you said and just as you were about to climb down this tree, you saw something coming from that exact town. There appeared to be someone or something coming to this fields, but who?
114.title: A spooky adventure

1142.content:
You hid behind a leaf as a fancy-looking figure entered the grassy area. She was cloaked in black, had pale skin, dark hair, and...fangs?

There could only be one answer: she was a vampire!

But did you dare approach this attractive vampire girl? Who knows what would happen?
1142.title: Bloodsucking Beauty

11421.content:
Against your better judgment, you walked out from behind the leaf and toward the vampire giantess, who just seemed to be...standing and looking around. Maybe she wanted someone to drain blood from? Maybe she was just...lonely?

The pale-fleshed girl's eyes turned over to you, and she bent down to get a better view of your puny form.

"Wha...what is that?" She squinted, trying to make sure she wasn't just imagining things.

"Um...h-hello..." you responded nervously.

"A tiny human..? That's something you don't see every day. What brings you here?"

You gulped. "Well...I'm not sure how to explain it...I found a mysterious object one day, and when I picked it up, BAM! I found myself in this place."

The vampire girl looked down at you, with a soft frown. "You know, this is one of the few times fate has been kind to a vampire like myself."

"You're...you're a vampire?"

"Indeed. So...what's your name?" You introduced yourself to the giantess. "Interesting...my name is Laura. I've been wandering for a long time, looking for a..."
11421.title: Talking to the Vampire Girl

choices: "...but in the meantime, you're welcome to stay with me."
114211.content:
You found yourself speechless at the most recent words to come out of Laura's lips. At first, you had secretly worried that the vampire girl might just want to feed on your life essence...but as it turned out, she was just looking for mortal companionship all this time.

"It's a pity that not everyone lives forever..." Laura frowned softly. "But if you're willing to spend time with me, I will cherish our friendship for however long it lasts."

"W-well..." you began to reply. "That'd be...wonderful!"

A smile crept onto Laura's face...which was rare for a lonesome vampire. "Thank you...that really means a lot!"

Leaning in for a moment, she pursed her lips as her face approached your tiny form. For a moment you were afraid of a painful bloodsucking (or worse, a slow death in stomach acid), but that fear quickly faded when Laura...kissed you! Your cheeks turned a deep red in response.

"I realize you may have a family that misses you greatly..." Laura spoke. "There may be a way to return you to your realm..."
114211.title: Friends with a Vampire

11423.content:
You spent a few good minutes carefully climbing down the giant tree you were currently standing on. You were at first scared that you were going to fall off but you manage to put on a brave face and proceeded downwards. You look behind to see that same vampire girl; now sitting on a tree stump. What was she doing right now is beyond your guess.

After reaching just a few feet from ground, you released your grip from the tree and land on your feet. You slowly look around and that's where noticed that everything around you looked huge! "What the heck? I'm I...tiny?" you said with a shock look on your face. In this size, you now find everything around you even more terrifying than before the first time you got here. The plant and grass that now towered above you makes the entire fields look surreal and disturbing to you as if you were in a haunted forest that will get you lost after you step foot into it. You plan to get a closer look at that suppose vampire but in this size, it's probably now risky as you could end up getting stepped on like a bug. "But it's now or never!" you said as you ran into the patch of grass.

You just starting your adventure and yet you were still feeling very uneasy with the eerie plants and grass all around you; the full moon from the sky made them look even more terrifying from the moonlight. The flowers closely resembled human skulls, all looking at you from above and enough to send shiver down your spine as you trek forward.

Thankfully, you finally exit the creepy forest of flower skulls and dark grasses. "Thank god the nightmare is finally over!" you said. You look up to finally see the giant vampire; up close and personal. She closely resemble a young teen (about 14-16). Her fancy attire constant a blouse with a long Victorian-style skirt that is tied up in a long white ribbon. If you look closely within the dress, you can see she wears a pair of long, brown, old-fashioned, boots. She appeared to be reading a book on her lap and so far, she clearly haven't spotted you.
11423.title: Studing the vampire from the darkness

choices: You were hanging on Laura's back
You were grabbing on Wanda's broomstick
You were inside Wanda's bag that she dropped on the ground
114232.content:
Laura stood there on a tree stump and waited patiently; reading her book to pass the time. "I sure hope Wanda makes it on time today." she said. Although the witch was a fast broom rider, she was terribly clumsy and often times gets herself in many embarrassing accidents; maybe that's why she is late so often. Laura is calm and doesn't get angry often, but she kinda wished she should watch where she's going. "Perhaps I should teach her to be more careful along the way." said Laura as she looked at the dark sky.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

Meanwhile, you overheard the young vampire lady about someone named Wanda and thought that who ever this Wanda is might also not be normal since you are in a very huge and spooky place after all. Just as you were about to get a little closer to the giant vampire, a soaring sound is heard from the sky which got both you and the giant's attention. You saw what looks like another giant coming straight for the ground on a broomstick at high speeds. Thankfully, you are not in the way of this broom rider and instead crashes in front of the girl.

BOOM!!!!!!!!!

After the impact, your whole world shakes like an earthquake causing you to fall off from your feet. You look to find the source of the quakes and saw the second giant lying in the ground. The giant slowly gets up from the ground and you later got a good view of the figure.

It was another girl that is about the same age as the vampire. She had red hair that is tied in braids and she wore a pair of circular glasses. She is wearing a red cloak with grey sleeves that is tied up by a black belt, a witch's hat of the same color and a pair of black boots with blue and white stockings. The most odd thing about her, besides her massive size, was her skin color; it was light blue, this girl appeared to be based on a witch of some sort.

The vampire stood up and walked towards the witch.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

"You're late as always Wanda." said Laura.

"My apologies Laura, you know how I'm not experienced on broom riding yet." said Wanda

"Well since you here let's go, shall we?"

"Okay!"

The two get ready to go to their destination as Laura shifts into her bat from and Wanda got on her broomstick. They flew high up into the air and soar through the skies.

Little did they know that a very tiny creature managed to hitch a ride on one of them as they go.
114232.title: Wanda's Arrival

115.content:
World 5

This world looks a lot like feudal Japan, with pagodas, rice fields, and shrines. There are normal people here, dressed in Japanese clothing, as well as some human-like spirits known as youkai. You may as well try to sneak yourself some sushi or rice balls to eat...but then you'd risk being eaten.

World 6

A high-tech city with human-shaped aliens...they look so human, you might not even realize they're aliens! Skyscrapers and flying saucers are common sights in this bustling metropolis. Tiny people like you...not so much.
115.title: Other Worlds...

choices: Surrounded by big oval shaped things (in a bowl of rice)
On a wooden surface with huge walls in the distance (in someones house)
On a wooden surface with a large pillar and arches above you (on a geta sandal)
1151.content:
As you were being pulled into the large sphere you had a weird feeling come over you, but at the same time you were starting to lose consciousness and soon you black out.....

You wake up after what might have been hours with a slight headache. You were lying down and you soon get up while slowly opening your eyes, trying to see where you are now. You vision was still blurry but after a few minutes you started make out what was around you. You finally see that you are....
1151.title: Tiny in Feudal Japan

11511.content:
Looking around, you notice countless big, whitish oval-shaped objects around you. You also notice that you and these big ovals are in what looks to be some kind of...bowl.

Wait...a bowl?!

Yikes!! You've been shrunk down to an incredibly small size (the exact size even you aren't sure), and have somehow ended up in a bowl of rice!

A young, attractive woman is seated at the table where your giant bowl prison rests. Two long, wooden sticks reach into the bowl and snag some of the rice grains (thankfully not including you) before depositing them in the giantess's open mouth. The woman removes the empty chopsticks and chews the rice for a moment before swallowing, and you see a small lump slide down her throat.

Better hope she sees you, or you're next!

You wave and yell for help, hoping this towering maiden will notice your tiny, thrashing form in her rice bowl...but does your plan work?
11511.title: The Rice is Right

choices: "...want me to get you some food?"
115111.content:
The wooden chopsticks eventually grab your squirming body despite your best efforts to escape the rice bowl. You find yourself being raised toward the giantess's parting lips fairly quickly, and you close your eyes to brace for the end...

...but suddenly your course towards her mouth stops. You've been noticed!

"Wha...huh..?" The woman reacts to seeing a tiny young man in her rice.

"H-hello..." you say nervously. "I bet you're wondering how I got here..."

"You could say that, yes."

You briefly explain to the giantess that a mysterious portal sucked you into this realm and shrunk you to the size of...well, something tiny. The woman is silent for a moment, unsure what to make of this whole situation. Then she speaks.

"That's quite a story..." she says at last. "Well, my name is Midori. What's your name?" You introduce yourself to Midori nervously. "That's a nice name! Well, now that that's settled..."
115111.title: The Rice is Not Right

choices: Yes, you might be puked out!
115112.content:
Unfortunately, your struggles go completely unnoticed by the giantess as she snatches up your tiny body with those unforgiving chopsticks of hers. You are quickly deposited in the moist cavern of her mouth as her lips close behind you, sealing you in darkness. While you manage to dodge the chomping teeth of your unknowing captor again and again, her slimy tongue finishes the job by flicking you into the lightless throat ahead, and the woman swallows you whole with an awkward gulp.

You find yourself being squeezed down the tight esophagus before being forced through a small sphincte and finally falling into the depths of the woman's stomach. The walls are pulsating steadily, and a nearby greenish lake bubbles with digestive acids. In a panic, you run to the nearest wall and pound on its fleshy surface, yelling and screaming for help.

Does the giantess feel this?
115112.title: Eaten by an Unaware Japanese Woman

choices: Climb up her bare feet to reach her hair
11512.content:
As your eyelids slowly open, you have to blink several times to get used to the dim light in the room. A fierce wind howls at the walls. A candle flickers from far away, its weak illumination casting deep shadows across the furniture. Except, the scale of this room seems… off. It’s not just the light playing tricks on your eyes, this room is huge! You’re currently on a wooden table at the center of the room. As you’re about to peer over the edge, you hear a commotion coming from just outside the door. Not wanting to be seen in your current state, you hide underneath a the page of an overturned scroll.

No sooner were you out of sight, when two burly samurai burst through the door, dragging a tied up girl behind them. The young woman looked terrified as she was being roughly handled by the two thugs, who coarsely slammed her to the tatami floor directly in front of the table you were hiding on. The beautiful young woman wore an ornate kimono and her silky black hair hung down to the small of her back. The only blemish on her ivory complexion was the terrified look on her face, with tears streaming down her cheeks.

“I don’t understand! What have I done to deserve this?!” she bawled between sobs.

“You are the next in line to be sacrificed! If we don’t carry out this act, then the demon will destroy our village!” the larger samurai scowled. They were so close you could almost smell his breath.

“The demon demands another virgin maiden. Just think of how many lives your sacrifice will save,” the second samurai said, while making sure the ropes around her arms and legs were taught. “And don’t try to escape again!”

The samurai finally leave, as a peal of thunder rips open the sky outside and the wind seems to grow even stronger. The girl pulls herself up into a seated position on her knees. It would be an absolute shame for such a beauty to be eaten by some horrible monster. You remember hearing about the Japanese folk hero Issunboshi, who was just about your size. The girl sobs quietly as you look around for something to cut her ropes with. Something metallic glints in the unsteady light. It’s a sewing needle! It’s no sword, but it will have to do. You should try freeing her before introducing yourself, though. Her body is no longer wracked by sobs, so climbing her shouldn’t be too hard. Grabbing a scrap of cloth to use as a parachute, you jump off the edge of the table and float down to the tatami mat floor. At your size, you can see each individual reed. The question is, how should you approach her?
11512.title: A dark and stormy and demon-filled night

choices: You and Ouka make an easy getaway
115122.content:
Making your way to the poor girl's feet, you make a daring jump onto her right foot. The girl feels something there and worries it might be a bug...but then...would a bug really carry a sword -- er, needle? And why would a bug be cutting the rope and freeing her legs? Whatever the case, she remains quiet as you climb her leg, not wanting to alert the samurai guards...or the village demon.

You bravely climb your way up the giantess's kimono before eventually reaching the next knot of rope, which currently restrains her hands. Feeling courageous enough, you leap forward and slice the rope with your trusty needle...only to land on the ground hard...face-first!

The girl, no longer tied up, rushes over to your tiny form and scoops you up to eye level, letting you recuperate in her palm.

"Thank you..." the girl smiles. "Are you ok?"

"I think so..." you respond, rubbing your sore head.

"I'm surprised that you're so small...but a hero's a hero. What's your name?"

You tell the young lady your name.

"That's a cute name! My name is Ouka. The guards of Sakura Village had planned to offer me to appease the Majin of Flames...but you rescued me!"

"I hate to cut this talk short," you say, "but we need to get out of here before you're caught!"

Ouka nods and places you atop her right shoulder before stealthily escaping the room. How you manage to maintain your perch is a mystery for the era...
115122.title: Heroism on a Smaller Scale

1151221.content:
Ouka runs out of the building, with you perched on her shoulder, and finds a quiet area where no one might notice the escapee. She delicately picks you up and lets you stand atop her palm, in front of her wonderful eyes.

"That...was close," you say.

"It certainly was," Ouka replies, "but now that it's just you and me..."
1151221.title: Escaping

choices: You agree to go with Ouka.
You decline. Or something else happens.
11512211.content:
Ouka's question leaves you completely and utterly stumped. You hadn't thought this whole adventure through, and thus you're not sure what you and your new friend should do with the spare time you've gained...however long it lasts. The awkward silence is abruptly broken by the giantess whose shoulder you're currently sitting upon.

"I think I have an idea," Ouka smiles, "but only if you're OK with it."

"Um, sure..." you reply, not sure how else to answer.

"Those goons had me tied for quite a while...and running from them is starting to ache my feet! Could you maybe...rub them a little?"

You blush a beet red at her request. After all you've done to free her from becoming the latest offering for a village demon...Ouka wants you to give her a foot massage?! But, then again, you're at no position (or size) to refuse.

"S-sure...yes...I can do that for you."

Ouka giggles cutely, sitting down on a wooden table and moving her legs in such a way that you have an easier time reaching her feet. Anticipating the scent of sweat, you are given a pleasant surprise as you approach the towering woman's feet -- they smell like...flowers! For a moment you lose yourself to the heavenly smell, but quickly shake your head and return to your senses, reaching your arms out to gently massage Ouka's toes. She is unable to suppress a moan of satisfaction, but somehow she is able to keep her feet still, even as you progress past her toes and closer to her soles. This giantess is practically in paradise, and you feel genuinely glad to do her a favor.

Maybe being tiny and stuck in feudal Japan isn't so bad after all!

"Thank you, little guy," Ouka says, allowing you to stop your massage and regain your stamina. "I needed that. We should probably get out of here before we're caught again, though...I think it's best if I take you home! Is that alright?"

You think for a moment about the choice you've been given. You do miss your real home, but Ouka has been so gentle and kind to you, it'd break her heart to see you leave! Decisions, decisions...
11512211.title: A Hero's "Reward"

choices: "Maybe we can eat from the rice fields?"
"Um...why are you licking your lips like that?!"
11512212.content:
Your conversation with the girl you'd recently rescued is abruptly cut short as Ouka's stomach lets out a low, loud growl.

"Yikes! Sorry about that," Ouka blushes, putting a hand to her belly. "I hadn't eaten anything since I'd been taken away by those guards..." The giantess's eyes suddenly dart over to you.

What's your response?
11512212.title: A Girl's Gotta Eat

115122122.content:
Ouka looks over at tiny little you atop her palm, and she's licking her lips rather slowly.

Wait...licking her lips?!

"Um, why are you looking at me like that?" you ask, somehow knowing what's coming.

"Aw, come on, little guy," Ouka replies, "you're so tiny and bite-sized! I bet you would taste great..."

Before you can begin to argue (not that you're in any position to do so anyway), the giantess pops you into her mouth, closing her teeth and lips as you land on her slimy, pink tongue. The slippery appendage tosses you around your prison for a few moments, making you dizzy, before finally flicking you back into the darkness of her esophagus, and Ouka swallows you with a soft gulp.

You are slowly squeezed down her throat before being deposited through a tight sphincter and landing in the hot, moist chamber of Ouka's stomach. The walls are pulsating slightly, and a nearby greenish lake is bubbling with acid.

Understandably, you're terrified by this experience, so you run to the nearest fleshy wall and pound repeatedly, yelling for help, but will Ouka puke you up?
115122122.title: Well, THIS turned around quickly...

choices: ...the acid splashing you, but not digesting you
1151221222.content:
As you keep beating at the rubbery stomach walls, a sudden thumping knocks you back into the acidic lake of your organic prison. On the outside, Ouka is simply patting her tummy.

"Sorry I had to eat you," Ouka coos, with a hand to her belly. "If it makes you feel any better, you were a wonderful meal!"

As a matter of fact, her words do NOT make you feel any better. At all. The only thing you feel is...
1151221222.title: Stuck Inside Ouka

11512212221.content:
Just when you believe things can't get any worse, you feel a sharp stinging sensation at your feet and ankles - crap!! The stomach acid! Desperately you try to escape the boiling lake, but unfortunately you slip and fall face-first into the juices. The pain is excruciating, and you quickly black out from the sheer agony...

...

Slowly and groggily, you awaken somewhere in the outside world. But for some reason, you can't move! You can't even see your limbs or body...this is odd. However, you can feel a dainty hand rubbing you...

Then everything becomes crystal clear. You've been digested and absorbed into Ouka's...
11512212221.title: Part of Ouka

choices: ...the Majin staring right back, with a wicked smile!
1151222.content:
The moment Ouka steps outside, with tiny you perched on her right shoulder, you both feel a sudden and unwelcome warmth in the area. A series of flames merges together to form a humanoid figure, with a slim body, wavy hair, and...breasts?!

"The Majin of Flames..!" Ouka gasps.

"Oh my gosh..! The Majin is a girl?!" you react.

"Oho, so my next offering is trying to escape, hm?" The Majin teases. "Ah, and you've got company with you! Tiny company. Your little friend doesn't seem to be from here...ah, well. I can't afford to be picky these days!"

The fiery demoness slowly and tauntingly approaches you and Ouka, the latter paralyzed by fear. In a panic, you tug at your friend's ear, trying to snap her out of it.

"Ouka, come on! We have to get out of here!!" you plead, and surprisingly, Ouka regains her senses. She turns and makes a run for it, the sprint forcing you to cling on to her ear like never before. The Majin of Flames picks up her own pace, while maintaining her playful cruelty.

"Don't fight your fates, mortals!" The demoness taunts again, inching ever closer to catching up with her prey. "This was bound to happen to you sooner or later, heheh..."

Miraculously, the Majin trips over a stray plank of wood, falling right onto her face. Ouka takes the opportunity to run and hide behind the walls of Sakura Village's keep, turning to her shoulder to check on you.

"Are you alright, little one?" Ouka asks compassionately.

"Yeah..." you reply. "Is the coast clear?"

Ouka takes a quick peek past the castle wall and finds...
1151222.title: The Majin of Flames is...FEMALE?!

choices: ...and is greeted by the Shogun himself.
...but is ambushed by the Majin of Flames!
11512221.content:
Peeking beyond the castle walls, Ouka lets out a quiet sigh of relief. “We’re safe, for now.”

“That’s good...” you respond to the giantess whose shoulder you’re currently perched upon. “But we need to hide, at least until the Majin gives up this pursuit.”

“But will the Shogun allow us to stay in his keep? I mean, with your help, I narrowly escaped being sacrificed...”

You can’t bear to see Ouka so worked up, even though you two met not that long ago. “That’s a chance we have to take.”

Nodding to her tiny companion, Ouka nervously approaches the gates of Sakura Village’s keep...
11512221.title: Safe and sound...for now.

choices: A young miko girl going to perform her shrine duties
A geisha woman going to rehearse a dance
11513.content: The landscape stretched around you and the ground you were standing on is made out of wooden materials. "What is this place?" you asked yourself. For some reason, everything looked to be the shape of a giant sandal...or that's what you think it is. You were confused about this and try to figure out what is going on when suddenly, everything goes dark as a huge shadow has cast over you like a giant jet plane. You quickly turn around as you realized that it was coming from behind you. You eyes grew huge as you saw what it was: a colossal socked foot that loomed over you; it was even big enough to cover the entire body of who ever it was. You ran as fast as you can to avoid getting stepped on, but unfortunately you come across a sheer cliff of the giant sandal as you look ahead to find out that you were real lucky that it avoided you as it slide on to the sandal, nearly pushing you off. You looked at the foot in fear as you realized that you were nothing more than an insignificant little insect to it, making you shudder in fear. You look up once more to finally get a view on who it was.
11513.title: The great sandal

1152.content:
"Ughhh...my head.." you moaned as you woken up from your adept to escape that orb-shaped wormhole. As you put your hand on the floor, it suddenly felt cold, hard, and metallic. You wonder what's wrong until you finally opened your eyes and saw that you're no longer in your basement anymore, instead you were in the middle of a metallic tunnel with a cool breeze blowing from all directions. "What the? How did I get inside a giant air vent?" you ask yourself and began to wander around. You don't know where you are going, but you do want to find an exit to get of this place.

After what looked like hours of traveling across the vent, you finally saw the exit to this bizarre place. It was just a simple opening to the air vent with many bars and such. You don't know where you truly are exactly so decided to just take a peak on where it leads to. You soon got shock when you realized it leads to...
1152.title: Intergalatic city

choices: Check out one of the bedrooms
Head back and try to escape
You suddenly heard footsteps walking up the stairs
11521.content:
(http://www.writing.com/main/campfires/it... For more info on the Kyaneos, check out their character bios on this now cancelled campfire story.)

Not just any ordinary hallway, but a huge one indeed. It was both long and big at the same time! You couldn't help but felt like a tiny speck around here. Aside from that, everything looked...well pretty normal. There's an incredibly large cabinet that could even tower over the statue of liberty! You around frequently and saw what appeared to be a staircase leading to the first floor, some objects scattered across the floor such as a giant jack piece and even a large piece of earring, several doors leading to many different rooms, and a set of lamps hanging from the ceiling. By the looks of it, this seemed to look like a hallway in the middle of a house. "Now this is defiantly a whole different world!" you said.

At first you thought that you are all alone in this scary huge house, however you could hear some faint noises coming from the two doors at the far right. You couldn't make out what they are, but you could believe that they must of lead to different bedrooms because it sounds like someone can be heard from both of them. You were curious to know who they belong to, but you soon remembered that you were the size of a tiny speck in this world so you ended up getting second thoughts. You might as well try to head back to the air vent and try to escape from this house.
11521.title: Welcome to the Kyaneos household!

115211.content:
Not only you were curious to know, but you were also quite vulnerable in this world so you need at least a safe shelter that you could be safe. However since you don't know much about these giant, you might as well keep at least a safe distance away from them.

You first arrive at the door that was at the end of the hallway. From there, you heard a faint sound of rock music coming from behind it as well the sound of stomping and loud singing that sounded like a female teenager. You could tell that the girl was rocking out to rock music of some sorts. Looking up, you saw that the door has a large poster containing a silhouette of a guitarist at the center and on top of it was a label that reads "Cindy's room". "I guess this Cindy girl is a pretty rockish type of gal." you said

You then soon go on the next door which is located next to the first one on the same wall that was the air vent from where you came from was also located. You listen closely to at first heard nothing until you hear the sounds of voices, giggling, and shrieking from a couple of young pre-teen girls from inside the room, indicating that the owner of this room was with a bunch of friends. You looked up to see that the door was covered in red and pink hearts of many sizes with a pink colored label that reads "Libby's room". "Sounds like whoever Libby is was quite cheerful and upbeat." you said.

At first you thought that you covered everything, you however saw a door at the far left and saw what looked like a label. You ran to check it out. After you made it towards to the door, you soon have heard completely nothing at all; the room just stood quietly. You peek inside from the large gap under the door and saw a large bed. On top of it, you saw a huge bump which you soon discovered that the giant in question was actually taking nap. You looked up to see no decorations just a label that reads "Katie's room". "This Katie person must be tired." you said.

After all of that's done, where do you decided to go?
115211.title: The three bedrooms

1152111.content:
You ran to the the door which leads to the room that belonged to Cindy. From where you are, you can hear her singing and dancing away from the music. You were not very interested in hearing what kind of song is she singing to so you walk towards the small gap and slowly crawl underneath it.

You stop halfway in the middle to see what both the room and giant looks like and wow, you never expected to see something like this.

The bedroom was quite large and not only that, it looks very advanced. The room looks like something from a sci-fi movie as you can see a large round bed, a table with books and a large computer, a bunch of holographic posters of many types of musicians, and many more.

The one that you noticed the most was a dancing floor of some sort and a large TV screen on the wall which features a video of a rock band performing. This was also where you found the giant teenager who was dancing and singing to the singers from the screen. The girl in question had long red hair with a blue headband on top of it. She is wearing a pink sleeveless top that exposes her midriff, a pair of black yoga pants, and blue flip-flops. At first glance, she looks pretty normal until you noticed the fact that she has a long blue tail and a set of long antennas. What kind of teenage girl is she?

The giantess turns a bit while dancing and that's where you realized that she have blue skin; making her look like an alien of some sort. Just what kind of world are you currently on?

You watch as she contined to dance away and thought about going towards her, but you know that will be WAY too risky and decided to wait for her to stop. However, you really wanted to seek her help and ask her what the heck are you doing in her world.
1152111.title: Dancing Giant Teen

1152112.content:
You headed towards the door that leads to the room belonging to a young girl named Libby. You were kinda curious on what this Libby girl looks like so you bent down and crawl underneath the gap of the door. It wasn't very comfortable doing this because your back grinds against the door and thought that your back was going to be sore but nonetheless, you managed to survive all that and made it into the room.

You look around to see that the room is not what you ever seen before. While the bedroom looks just like any another typical girl's room such as being all pink and girly looking, it was also quite futuristic looking as it was very big. You can see another path that leads to another room but you soon discovered that it was actually a large closet. On the bed, you can see three giant sitting on top of it; it was the girls you been hearing about from the outside but.....something was odd about them.

The one on the middle has short blond hair that was tied up in a ponytail and she wore a green shirt with a yellow star on it, a brown skirt, and a pair of black boots. The weird part is that she has blue skin with a pair of antennas and you closely see a tail behind her.

The one on the left is had blue hair that was tied up in pigtails. She wore a pink dress, red tights, and a pair of white ballet flats. She also has yellow skin with a pair of wings on her back.

The one on the right has purple hair and wears a sleeveless blue top and a blue skirt. She's the most oddest of the three as she only has tentacles instead of legs and three eyes.

Your mouth was wide open as you realized that these girls look very much like aliens. What kind of alien planet are you on? So far, they didn't noticed you as they are still talking with each other.

You don't know why but you wanted to get a close look on one of them, maybe out of curiosity.

Where will you go?
1152112.title: Strange Preteen Giants

1152113.content:
Of all the three girls, the one named Katie is the only one who isn't doing anything other than sleeping on her bed and that will be more safe to approach. You run all the way to the far left and crawl below the door.

After some time (and some bit of back pain), you managed to get into the bedroom. You look around and thought the style of the room was built was kinda fancy and advanced too. The room wass white, large, and looks pretty average, but it was also full with lots of cool stuff that usually belongs in the future like the fact how it was big enough to have a small sitting space with high-tech looking chairs and the fact the bed has some neon lights around it.

The giant young girl is sleeping on the bed just like how you saw from outside, but you also got a good look of her now. She appears to have short red hair that was tied up in braids. She wore a red shirt and blue jeans. Due to taking a nap, she has no shoes right now. You got immediately got confused when you realized that her skin is colored blue and she has a small tail and a pair of antennas.

"This girl looks more like an alien than what I expect to be similar to a human girl." you said while you stare at her dumbfounded; you were no longer on planet earth anymore. You walk towards the bed and think about trying to wake her up and get her attention. She sure may look young but you think that maybe she could help you out.

Then again, you can also take advantage of this situation and...maybe have some fun.
1152113.title: Little Sleeping Giant

choices: Outside, someone turn up the air vent and you were blown into a random opening
115212.content:
You climb back inside the air vent; thinking that approaching any giants around here is just too risky. You found yourself inside the familiar metallic chamber and quickly knew that you will probably get lost in here, but you just know that this vent might probably lead to a room with an exit to the outside world.

You wander across the giant vent once more, but this time more focused on getting out. You kinda of know some of the layout after you sent a good hour walking around here. While walking around, you can see a glowing red light at the corner which has a giant fan on the wall. Due to your size, you decided not to approach it because you believe that you were small enough to get blown off from the floor and end up in who knows were. Of course, the air wasn't that very strong at the moment since the fan is rotating at moderate speed right now, but you still don't want to risk it.

You soon come across a slope that probably leads downstairs. "Okay then, looks like I'll just take a slide of faith down." you said as you sat down at the slope and slide down; hoping you'll survive on the way. While sliding, you can see another opening on the way, but you think it might lead to the staircase or something.

After all of that, you reach the end of the slope and got up from the ground. "Looks like I made it." you said "Now that to find a room to escape." You walk across the air vent from within the walls of the first floor of the house and try to look around for an opening.

At last, you managed to located an opening...twice. First things first, you were standing in the middle of a fork in the road which leads to two paths and both of these paths have openings.

Which one will you take?
115212.title: Back Inside The Air Vent

choices: A giant woman with a broom appears (Maria coming to sweep the kitchen)
A giant girl appears (Libby is going to eat from the cookie box)
Nothing happens and you try to go outside afterwards
1152122.content:
You choose the opening from the right path and walked towards it. You thought that it might lead to a room where there's a door that leads you outside, but you just have go there and see for yourself.

You made it to the exit and take a small peak to where it leads to. The room that you saw was the biggest (even at the same size in this world) and most advanced kitchen you ever seen. It was white and grey at the same time and there were several green lights across many furnitures. Everything you saw looks exactly like the ones you usually see in every kitchen, but they were very futuristic. This house seems very advanced and whoever owns it favors lots of technology.

You look around in hopes of finding a door or anything that leads outside and just as you expected, you saw a huge glass door that appears to be the backdoor. You can't see what's out there too much, but you can see the clear sky and it was enough to make your expectations correct.

In front of you, a small pile of crumbs of some kind were scattered across the floor. "You know, I am getting a little bit hungry." you said "Maybe I could eat some of these and hopefully I could get out before anyone notices anything." You climbed your way between the gaps and jump down to the floor. You make your way to the crumbs and pick up one that was just for your size. You take a small bite; trying to see what kind of food it is. Tasting the piece, you found out that taste like a cookie of some kind. You look up and see a giant box on the counter above you and saw a picture of a cookie-like food. It appear that the food you are eating was in fact just that.

You eat the entire crumb and go for a second. Although you are not that hungry, you just want to eat some more since you like cookies alot; hopefully nothing is going to happen while you eat.
1152122.title: Right To The Kitchen

choices: You make a run for the backdoor
