And it was obvious - by the tilt in her hold, the slant in her eye, and the demeaning words slipping from her long blue tongue - that keeping you safe wasn't a priority. But by the way it sounded, little humans might not be welcome here; or they may be victims to horrible torture. What would happen to you if you were at the mercy of this "Dark Goddess"?

And anyways, when you looked at it from here, spread out like a map of soft folds - but still with a nice, toned surface. The red soil lay between the expanse of her simple bikini top and bottom, lathered with a river of sweat from her cleavage. You couldn't lie; it was nice.

Better the devil you know. With a gulp, you nodded profusely, staring at her face. "I... I liked your belly, Miss Bezella! Please, don't be mad."

She laughed, hand to her hip. It looked as if an ember emerged from her other palm. "You're honest, wandering mortal. Maybe foolhardy, but honest. Of course, who can blame you!" She stretched out over the towel, basking in the rays of the sun. "I put a lot of work into keeping it in shape, after all! So, you'll be happy to know - your payment could very well make Bezella's beautiful stomach even more glorious..." She grinned, indulging in the sensation of your terror.
11533122.title: Shores of the Netherworld

choices: You get digested and absorbed into Bezella’s abs
You go through her system, somehow surviving
Bezella spews you up for some reason
115331221.content:
Your heart nearly stopped in response to Bezella’s words. She was...planning to EAT you?! Given the fact that she was a demoness and not an ordinary woman, Bezella’s stomach acids would likely be especially painful for you. She might even be able to bind your soul to her abs after digesting your body!

Without further ado, Bezella opened wide and tossed you past her parted lips, feeling you land on her salivating tongue. You struggled to stand on the slippery muscle, but it made no difference - the demon woman’s teeth and lips closed tight, trapping you within her warm, moist mouth. However, it seemed your captress wasn’t interested in a taste test - the tongue below tilted up, sliding you towards the dark abyss of her throat. Bezella’s esophagus eagerly accepted your tiny form, swallowing you alive and whole with a quick gulp.

After a hellish descent down the tight gullet, you plummeted into Bezella’s stomach with a splash. The reddish walls pulsated steadily, and the bubbling acids glowed a sickly green. Running to the nearest wall of your fleshy prison, you pounded your tiny fists against the rubbery surface repeatedly, screaming for help.

What happens next?
115331221.title: The Depths of the Demoness

choices: "We're going to pay my friend Acedia a visit!"
115331222.content:
"You'll be helping its tan!"

With a small, teasing smile the deep-red demoness opened her fingers. You slid right off the smooth pillars, falling a great distance. All the sands and flashing bodies of beachgoers whir by you as you descend, lower and lower; before finally landing on her stomach. The tight black swimsuit Bezella wore left little to the imagination; judging by the other titans in the distance, partly distorted by the heat lines, small bikinis were the current fashion in the underworld. Now, the chest of your captor, in those loose cloths, looked like great mountains that fielded in your landscape. The slow, relaxed breaths she let out rocked them up and down; even when it looked like a world of glistening red around you, every minute sound below reminded you that this was, indeed, a living being.

That is, if demons were "alive". You didn't know how Hell's mechanics worked; and you hoped, if you made this woman happy, she'd get you back up before you had to find out more. From above, Bezella's slanted, demonic eyes loomed, patches of otherworldly yellow in a blazing crimson sky. From this position, you could clearly see her mighty fangs as she spoke - clean, sharp, and pristine, like spires on a cathedral.

"Don't get too comfy down there. I know it must be hard not to enjoy Bezella's stomach... but you're on a mission, not a sightseeing tour." The world shook as Bezella's slender hand moved, reaching for great bottle of lotion from beside her generous ass. Her claw stealthily cracked the canister open, and she hovered it above her gut for a second. Just the tiniest bit of pressure from her fingers, and a stream of ethereal blue liquid swept down atop you. Nearly drowning in the demonic tan lotion, you swam to the top of the sticky glob, watching it sink into her flesh. It irrigated the fields and valleys of her stomach and abs. The dark red texture gained a lustrous sheen, that glistened against the crashing waves of magma. It almost felt as if something was moving by your hand - but that was probably only the quake of her stomach as she flopped back.

Her azure hair swept across the sandy beach, and she shook you a little by tapping on her gut - making you paddle in the sticky lotion as it crawled out to fill the new crevices in her soft gut. "Now, if you love my belly so much, rub that all in. Give it an even coat; I want to see it glisten all over!" She prodded you again, without even looking, content to sip away at a soda. "And hurry up, before the lotion dries away. It's a special gift from my friend, Acedia, and she wouldn't be like you wasting it."

You trudged out of the wet blob, rubbing your clothes - no matter what, the blue liquid still soaked them. You sighed to yourself, leaning over the skin. The flesh wriggled gently against your touch, as you brushed the lotion into its pores. Looking in the distance, the flowing magma shores shone far away - over a whole map of hills and valleys for you to rub. "Her gut's so huge... Why can't she get another demon to do it?"

"Do I hear a little sloth down there?" Bezella cooed, her singsong tone rattling you to your micro-sized feet as it rushed through the huge pipes below her skin. "Slothful mortals are punished the fifth hell, you know!"

Crap - this demon had super-strong vision AND hearing? You knelt down and began lathering the tanning lotion into her skin, running your fingers along the floor. You forced it in to the best of your ability, polishing the smooth, squishy surface until you ran out of liquid. Quickly, you ran across the fields of her stomach to get another handful of the tanning lotion, feeling the blue, glowing substance rush out of your hands.

The gigantic demoness pounded her fist in the sand - sending a few other beach visitors walking away. "Come on, put your back into it! Or maybe you want me to get a bad tan?" She reached out, fingers blotting out the light as they wiggled, brushing against her skin. "Maybe you'd rather face the Dark Goddess' legions as you drown in an endless swamp?"

Quickly, you sloshed the lotion all over her stomach - using your whole body as a sponge to rub it in roughly. Desperate to get that looming shadow off your back, you splashed more and more liquid across the red flesh. For the time being, you could ignore how gross it was as it clung to your hair and rushed under your shirt. You could ignore the face that sweat from her toned gut was starting to leak off on you, mixing with the blue-glowing oils with a wet, sloshing texture that absolutely engulfed your being. You could ignore the small, dreadful movements from her gut that seemed to grow as you spread more lotion over her world of a belly. All that mattered was making her happy.

With a long, quiet laugh, Bezella's stomach moved up and down - tripping you into a faceful of the gleaming torso. "Haha, that's hilarious!" She dragged her hand away, across the moist surface of her skin - and poked at her abs, the side of her hand brushing back the blue bikini top. "Now, up here, my speck of a sinner. You've yet to see Bezella's abdomen at its finest sheen."

She kicked back, soaking in the Netherworld's rays. You didn't dare grumble as you climbed closer to her abs, lathering more lotion within their folds. These weren't as forgiving as her stomach; they didn't let you squeeze the tanning liquid in, flesh overflowing between your fingers. They were like mighty walls that you had to climb over, slipping and sliding. Every part of your body fell down at least once, to the demoness' amusement, as you made your best attempt to follow her instructions. Sometimes, if she breathed in enough, bits of her skin would entrap you between them, pushing your face into the dazzling crimson curves - forcing you to fight back with all your might just for breathing space.

To top it all off, your job was occasionally interrupted by great noises from the beach nearby. A team of demons played volleyball nearby, and each harsh impact of the ball against their palms made you shake. At one point, it even slammed nearby; the ground rumbled as Bezella threw it back, letting you fall into a puddle of glowing azure as she lifted up gently. And right after that, she prodded you. "I hope you're not getting tired of my body... There's a lot more you have left!"

And it was back to work again. The liquid made a sizzling noise as you mixed it in, as if it were evaporating upon contact with the demoness' body. You weren't surprised; not only was the surface wet with sweat, both yours and the enormous sunbather's, the waves of lava around made the atmosphere as hot as...

...Well, as hot as hell.

Finally, panting, you collapsed at the greatest height of the demon girl's towering torso; right under the cool shade of her mighty bosom. Behind you lay the fruit of your work: fields upon fields of glowing, brilliant red flesh, lathered with the tanning lotion to a beautiful sheen. Every little goosebump, inch, hard corner, crease, wrinkle, and muscle glimmered with it. The skin below reflected your wet, disheveled face; you could barely recognize yourself.

"Mmmhm... That'll do." Bezella sighed, looking up to the sun. She nudged her flesh to press against you, feeling one last, weak wiggle from your tiny body. "You've done well."

When you stared down, ready to sink, you felt something push back up. The same strange movement that you'd sensed before; you'd thought it was just the mega demoness' unconscious movements, but standing still, it almost felt like multiple bumps against you, pushing from below the barrier of red. Reflected in her gleaming, beautiful skin, there was something other than your face...

There were dozens of other faces, screaming, pushing over you.

"Idiot boy, you've damned us all!"

"Oh Jesus, forgive me!"

The fainest echo of voices passed your head. You shifted it to the bottle of tanning lotion, finally getting a good look at it... It read "Sin Screen - Souls of the Damned in Liquid Format"

You felt your heart sink.

Rapidly, you shook your hands; but there was still blue, dripping soul lotion over your palms. You panted out, short of breath: "This... isn't tanning lotion! It's... human souls!"

The gigantic horned head soon appeared in the reflection beside you, teeth showing through her giggles. "It's both! My gorgeous skin needs regular application of soul energy to keep its perfect red luster!"

You looked over the fields in terror. This whole time, you didn't think there were any fellow humans. But human ghosts were there all along; and you were condemning them to a fate among these curvy masses! It made your stomach turn.

She put a hand to her hip, eyelids sinking smugly. "Don't act so shocked. It's a demon's job to punish sinners. If you ask me, I'm doing your world a favor." Gleefully, she poked her red finger right by her navel, the skin forming waves around it. "This here is the soul of a mass-murderer; he'll have to burn his wrath away here." The digit twisted in the sky, before poking her abdomen. "Oh, and this little soul here was the head of a pyramid scheme! She put people on the street from that!" Slowly, Bezella traced her digit up, before it landed right next to you. "And this little spirit here wrote degrading fetish stories... But never finished any of them!"

You heard a whiny, disembodied scream beside you: "I just got busyyyyyy..."

She reeled her head back in disgust, squeezing her slender fingers over her skin and digging canyons within. "Their sins will burn nicely in there, and they'll end up giving me a body befitting a Demon of Vaniglory."

You shook your head, sweat running down your neck. Just how had you gotten yourself in here? Could you really trust Bezella?

With her laugh finished, the red giantess moved a hand over to you. "Come on, now, mortal..."

115332.content:
In this world the dominant species is a kind of sapient equine that splits into two separate and distinct racial lines.
Huon: A race of highly intelligent feral horses
Hym: Anthropomorphic horses born with many of the traits that humans would have (Bipedal stance, fingers and thumbs, female breasts on the chest, etc.)

Some Background:
It is possible for a Huon to be born to Hym parents and a Hym to be born to Huon parents (though these tend to be rather rare in both cases) and Hym and Huon can easily interbreed.
Huon tend to be more cosmopolitan and scientifically and technologically savvy (probably to make up for the physical disability of having only hooves to work with), while Hym tend to be more spiritual and in tune with nature, though these are obviously not hard and fast rules. Likewise the Huon tend to be city dwellers while Hym tend to live out in the country, though again this is not a hard rule.
They are both ruled by a Queen, have a somewhat matriarchal social structure built around cooperation and trust, and both races have herd based family structures.

info.brief_description: These dimensions all came with one GIANT surprise for you. Good luck surviving...
info.description:
It was just a typical day at your house, doing nothing much expect doing what you usually do around the house. It was just normal at first until you decided to go into your basement to look around through your old junk. While looking, you spotted a bright crystal among your stuff; you don't remember having this mysterious object and picked it up. Little did you know that it caused you get wrapped into a gigantic parallel world. What kind of world it is will all lead up to you. Who knows maybe you could end up in a world of giant furries, monsters, or just normal-looking giants.

Here are the rules:

1. You can choose only one world at the time. Once you're in that world, you cannot go back and choose another one.

2. You are about the size of a flea in each world.

3. Your character can have any sort of personality such as adventurous, mischievous, fearful, and among other things.

4. Any sort of fetishes are allowed, but try to keep with the main theme of the story which is Macro stuff of course.

5. Keep up with the main theme of each world you're on.

6. You are small enough to go unnoticed by the giants. If you want to write an aware story, try to make an explanation on how they managed to find you.

7. Use at least descent grammar and try to put more details into your chapters.

8. Don't end the story so soon and too early.

9. Deaths are allowed, but make it more detailed instead of just a "You got eaten and died" sort of thing.

10. Giants must be humanoid.

11. Have fun!!!!

However, there's still a few limits that you must follow. Just because you can write whatever you want does not mean there's no rules.

New Rules:

1. No extreme sexual content with underage characters.

It's so damn obvious why stuff like this should never be in the story. I don't want to see a story involving NSFW material with young characters because it's seriously messed up. So please don't go too far with this sort of stuff with the chapter involve around them.

2. No rebirthing.

I can still tolerate Insertion stuff....even if that's not my cup of tea. However, I can't really make sense with rebirthing stuff (I mean how can't you be turn into a newborn just by going inside reproductive organs) so I'm afraid this sort of stuff aren't allowed. My apologizes to all you fans out there.

3. Toilet stuff

While I'm fine with some bodily functions like sweat, boogers, and so on. However, I'm not okay with pooping, peeing and other stuff that is commonly seen on the toilet. Seriously, I'm terribly grossed out by this sort of stuff. Of course, that doesn't mean everyone can't do their business as long it happens off-screen.
